lol something funny, was tryin to listen to you evp and im getting horrible static, i thought the mic was plugged in, it does that with the mic, but the mic not in, and sounds like someone talking through the speakers...hummm

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:                                  From an "ambient mic" I was testing. It's a mic designed to pick up all the 
 voices in a meeting hall. i was using it in the board room a few weeks ago. 
 "From Beyond your light--I'm Saving Your Life...." It's reversal is on the 
 end, not sure what it says, Ok, I think I know what it says, but it's 
 another one of the embarrassing copmments.
 
 Frank
